com.simcoder.snapchatclone.fragment.main

Class CameraViewFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.simcoder.snapchatclone.fragment.main.CameraViewFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner

    public class CameraViewFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    Fragment that handles the camera view. Makes use of the CameraKit library in order to achieve this.
